cmput301.f13t01.storylibrary

Class LocalManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.storylibrary.LocalManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LibraryManager, java.io.Serializable

    public class LocalManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, LibraryManager
    This class is designed to maintain all of the stories that are stored locally on the user's device. Saving, Loading, and Deleting are handled. This class is used as a singleton by GlobalManager, from the Application.
    Author:
    Reginald Miller, Jesse Chu, Jesse Huard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
